mapper.select: select a.iid as "iId",--系统自增加id a.precode as "PreCode",--住院号 a.createdate as "CreateDate",--简历日期 a.creator as "Creator",--建立人 a.deptname as "DeptName",--科室名称 a.patname as "PatName",--病人姓名 a.patsex as "PatSex",--性别 a.patage as "PatAge",--年龄 a.indate as "InDate",--入院日期 a.outdate as "OutDate",--出院日期 a.nativep as "Nativep",--籍贯 a.nationals as "Nationals",--民族 a.compay as "Compay",--工作单位 a.contact as "Contact",--联系方式 a.height as "Height",--身高 a.weight as "Weight",--体重 a.bmi as "BMI",--体重指数 a.bloodtype as "BloodType",--血型 a.bloodpress as "BloodPress",--血压 a.badhabit as "BadHabit",--不良嗜好 a.historydisease as "HistoryDisease",--既往病史 a.historydrug as "HistoryDrug",--既往用药史 a.historyfamily as "HistoryFamily",--家族史 a.historyallergy as "HistoryAllergy",--过敏史 a.drugreaction as "DrugReaction",--药物不良反应 a.indiag as "InDiag",--入院诊断 a.outdiag as "OutDiag",--出院诊断 a.treatanalyze as "TreatAnalyze",--治疗方案分析 a.treatmark as "TreatMark",--治疗监护要点 a.treatresult as "TreatResult",--药物治疗总结 a.istate as "iState",--药历状态 a.dsavedate as "dSaveDate",--药历保存时间 a.labinfo as "LabInfo" --患者检验信息 from SI_MSRECORDINFO_ZY a,SI_MSSYINFO_ZY b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.inid=b.syh and a.orgcode =#{map.Hoscode} and b.gendate>=to_char(#{map.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gendate<=to_char(#{map.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
